verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Emmanuel, Emmanuel, His name is called Emmanuel, God with us, revealed in us, His name is called Emmanuel.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Emmanuel, Emmanuel, Your name is called Emmanuel, God with us, revealed in us, Your name is called Emmanuel.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When I look into Your holiness When I gaze into Your lovely face, When the things that surround me become shadow, in the light of You. When Iâ€™ve found the joy of reaching Your heart. When my will becomes enthroned in Your love. When the things that surround me become shadow, in the light of You.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I worship You, I worship You. The reason I live is to worship You. I worship You, I worship You. The reason I live is to worship You.{/lang-eng}
